sentences.sContent: a proposal to protect several miles of thousand-year-old coral reef
sentences.sCn: 保护绵延数英里的千年古珊瑚礁的提案

synos.tran: [海洋][水运]暗礁；[地质]矿脉；收帆

words.tran: 冰箱；方形短茄克；缩帆结；双排扣水手上衣；收帆的人

trans.tranCn: 暗礁；[地质] 矿脉；收帆
trans.tranOther: a line of sharp rocks, often made of  coral  , or a raised area of sand near the surface of the sea
to tie up part of a sail in order to make it smaller
